de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.nodes
Class Movable

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      com.jme3.scene.Node
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.nodes.Movable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.asset.Asset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Carpet, Roc
public abstract class Movable
extends com.jme3.scene.Node

Visual-Computing Praktikum - Aufgabe 2

Any node which has the capability to move within the game needs to subclass Movable. This class provides helper methods to follow a MotionPath.

Author:
Bernd Späth, Wladimir Spindler and Saman Sedighi Rad
